title: The Life That Flashes by cryptic_nightmares
description:
Help support the Giggles Movie if you can on Indiegogo: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/giggles-indie-horror-movie#/

Everyone knows the saying: "Your life flashes before your eyes".

The Author: https://www.reddit.com/user/cryptic_nightmares/
Video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t8VB9NZtUYY

Check out my new books! A collection of Creepypastas compiled by some of my all time favorite authors and friends!
